title: Dolis
description: Mitsu has always been looked upon by men as the Dolis--the ideal girl, the eternal partner in any man's dream, the perfect lover... When Kishi falls head-over-heels in love with Mitsu, he soon discovers another side to this seemingly flawless woman. As the drama and romance between Mitsu and Kishi unfolds towards an unforgettable climax--the couple takes an extraordinary excursion into the uncharted arena where desire and romance confronts hope and survival.
author: Maki Kusumoto
